submission.individual-reflection: During this exercize I became familliar with SAX conversions and looked how XML to HTML and JSON conversions work under the hood. After working in the group I found ... Overall my solution was fine. I hope my feedback helps my teammates. I didn't improve my solution because everything was alright. SAX topic is quite interesting, but I didn't encounter it anywhere else. I guess it would be interesting to try implementing SAX, that populates DB with XML data or creates a SQL query for an already predefined DB Scheme.
